#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
   int t;
   cin>>t;
   for(int h=1;h<=t;h++)
   {
      string a,b,a1,b1;
      cin>>a>>b;
      a1='.'+a;
      b1='.'+b;
      int lpsB[b1.length()],lpsA[a1.length()];
      lpsB[0]=0;
      lpsA[0]=0;
      int length=0;
      int j=1;
     /* for(unsigned int i=1;i<a1.length();i++){
			int y = lpsA[i-1];
			while(y>0 && a1[i]!=b[y])
				y=lpsA[y-1];
			if(a1[i]==b[y]) y++;
			lpsA[i]=y;
			y=lpsB[i-1];
			while(y>0 && b1[i]!=a[y])
				y=lpsB[y-1];
			if(b1[i]==a[y]) y++;
			lpsB[i]=y;
		}*/
     while(j<b1.length())
       {
          if(a[length]==b1[j])
           {
               length++;
               lpsB[j]=length;
               j++;
           }
          else
           {
               if(length!=0)
                 length=lpsB[length-1];
               else
                {
                 lpsB[j]=0;
                 j++;
                }
           }
       }
       length=0;
       j=1;
       while(j<a1.length())
       {
          if(b[length]==a1[j])
           {
               length++;
               lpsA[j]=length;
               j++;
           }
          else
           {
               if(length!=0)
                 length=lpsA[length-1];
               else
                {
                 lpsA[j]=0;
                 j++;
                }
           }
       }
      
       bool done=0;
       for(int i=a1.length()-1;i>=1;i--)
         {
             if((lpsA[i]+lpsB[i])>=i)
             {
                 cout<<"Case "<<h<<": "<<i<<endl;
                 done=1;
                 break;
             }
         }
       if(!done)
         cout<<"Case "<<h<<": "<<"0"<<endl;
       
   }
   return 0;
}
